ch0285_40_kai/0101_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re doing as well as always
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0285_40_kai/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m glad you came to see me! I’m so happy
I could dance!
ch0285_40_kai/7101_0701_01_10:
I thought I’d mostly gotten used to life here on
Pasio, but...
ch0285_40_kai/7101_0701_02_10:
To be honest, I still don’t really understand all
these things that run on electricity.
ch0285_40_kai/7101_0701_03_10:
Like those devices that let you hear sounds across
great distances...
ch0285_40_kai/7101_0701_04_10: How in the world do those work?
ch0285_40_kai/7102_0701_01_10:
One of the things that’s surprised me since coming
to Pasio is all the new sounds I hear!
ch0285_40_kai/7102_0701_02_10:
Like the sound of an instrument powered by
electricity...so strange!
ch0285_40_kai/7102_0701_03_10:
It may seem perfectly normal to you, but it was
really quite shocking for me!
ch0285_40_kai/7103_0701_01_10:
You don’t see many Zorua or Zoroark in this era,
do you?
ch0285_40_kai/7103_0701_02_10:
Huh? The ones from the Hisui region look different
from the ones in other regions?
ch0285_40_kai/7103_0701_03_10:
The kind of space they occupy must affect their
appearance, then...
ch0285_40_kai/7103_0701_04_10: This must also be the will of Mighty Palkia.
ch0285_40_kai/7104_0701_01_10:
Dancing together is a wonderful way to
communicate our feelings to Pokémon!
ch0285_40_kai/7104_0701_02_10:
Even if we don’t understand each other’s words,
I really do feel like we’re getting our emotions
across to each other!
ch0285_40_kai/7105_0701_02_10:
If it’s not too much trouble...would you mind
dancing along to the sound of my flute?
ch0285_40_kai/7105_0701_03_10:
I thought up some choreography, but I can’t test it
out myself.
ch0285_40_kai/1701_0701_01_10:
Thanks for always helping me out! Please,
take this!
ch0285_40_kai/1701_0702_01_10:
Oh, there’s no need to thank me! I’m just happy to
keep learning from you!
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0701_01_10: The music of this era has really fast melodies!
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0701_02_10:
And more importantly, it echoes out all around this
huge space!
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0701_03_10:
It really helps me understand what Adaman was
saying about the flow of time.
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0701_04_10: Begrudged as I am to admit that...
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0702_01_10:
Is the sound coming from those electrical
machines? What’re they called...“speakers”?
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0702_02_10:
I see... So you’re using the help of not only people
and Pokémon but also machines...
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0702_03_10:
So many new things have been invented...  The
world sure has changed.
ch0285_40_kai/2501_0702_04_10:
It’s just like how Poké Balls became widely used
in Hisui...
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Would you like
to dance along to a song with me?
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d like to study more about the music and dance
here on Pasio.
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0701_03_10:
I want to learn lots of new things to take back to
the Pearl Clan. They’ll be so excited!
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0702_01_10: Say, don’t some Pokémon use dances as moves?
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0702_02_10: If a human could learn one of those dances...
ch0285_40_kai/2511_0702_03_10:
do you think we’d be able to have battles
between people and Pokémon?!
ch0285_40_kai/3001_0701_01_10:
Everyone looks so busy in the morning. I personally
don’t like the feeling of working against the
clock...
ch0285_40_kai/3003_0701_01_10:
Phew... Oh, hello there. Now that the sun’s out,
it’s getting quite hot...
ch0285_40_kai/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! It’s cool and comfortable at night,
so I’m on my way out to explore this island!
